# Stay

# London Olympus Hotel

  • Address: 35 Romford Rd, London E15 4LY, UK
  • Check-in: 2:00pm - 11:30pm
  • Check-out: 7:00am - 10:30am
  • Rooms: 2-bedroom, 3-bedroom

# Getting Around

Uber exists. Taxis are also an option, but very expensive.
